```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse', 'readxl', 'knitr')

for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```

```{r}
critiques <- read_xlsx("Data/Critiques.xlsx",
                      sheet = "Sheet1")
```
